1.3.0.name: connect20/Addressvalidator
1.3.0.description: Validate billing and shipping addresses in the One Page Checkout.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.4.0.name: connect20/Addressvalidator
1.4.0.description: Validate billing and shipping addresses in the One Page Checkout. Customer submits billing and shipping addresses and is shown a popup of valid addresses to choose from. With support for UPS, USPS, Fedex, Address Doctor and Melissa Data.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
